name: ohso! design
tagline: Long Beach Web Design and Marketing Agency
description:
ohso! design is a creative agency specializing in web design, graphic design and search engine marketing headquartered in Long Beach, California.
We offer results-driven design that keeps your business objectives in mind. Forget the jargon. We won't claim to "empower bricks-and-clicks schemas" or talk you into services you don't need. We take pride in creating understandable, clean, user and client friendly designs.
